Package org.codefarm.engine

Classes which implement a demo API for the CodeFarm system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CodeFarmInterface
    Demo interface for the Back End object to implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Algorithms
    Utility class for static methods (algorithms basically)
    Code
    Container for generated codes including the String and BigInteger representations
    CodeFarmBackEnd
    Demo class to show reference implementation of front-end to back-end interface
    CodeFormatter
    Contains a definition of a code including it's length and character set and provides methods to handle excluded characters and to produce the string representations of a BigIneger generated within the code space.
    CodeGenerator
    An instance of a generator.
    CodeSpace
    Instance of a code generation and formatting engine, or Code Space.
    RegisteredFrontEnd
    Demo class to show reference implementation of front-end to back-end interface

Package org.codefarm.engine Description

Classes which implement a demo API for the CodeFarm system. The CodeFarm system aims to provide a common PAI whereby multiple web front ends can acquire and manage instances of random unique code generators, as well as manage and associate user account information. Currently these classes only implement the code generation part of this functionality.
Author:
Oliver Thomas
